snippet: Hertha Berlin have signed Dutch centre-back John Heitinga on a free transfer from Fulham, the Bundesliga club said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Dutch Defender Heitinga Joins Hertha Berlin
headline.main: Dutch Defender Heitinga Joins Hertha Berlin

lead_paragraph: Hertha Berlin have signed Dutch centre-back John Heitinga on a free transfer from Fulham, the Bundesliga club said on Monday.
